00101 void CnipolTargetHists::Fill(ChannelEvent *ch)
00102 {
00103    UChar_t chId  = ch->GetChannelId();
00104    //UChar_t detId = ch->GetDetectorId();
00105 
00106    //string sDetId(" ");
00107    //sprintf(&sDetId[0], "%1d", detId);
00108    //char hName[256];
00109 
00110    //if (!ch->PassCutTargetChannel()) return;
00111 
00112    UChar_t chIndex = chId - gConfigInfo->data.NumChannels + 4;
00113    //UChar_t chIndex = chId - NSTRIP;
00114 
00115    switch (chIndex) {
00116    case 1:
00117       ((TH1*) o["hTargetChanVertYel"])->Fill(ch->GetAmpltd());
00118       break;
00119    case 2:
00120       ((TH1*) o["hTargetChanHorzYel"])->Fill(ch->GetAmpltd());
00121       break;
00122    case 3:
00123       ((TH1*) o["hTargetChanVertBlu"])->Fill(ch->GetAmpltd());
00124       break;
00125    case 4:
00126       ((TH1*) o["hTargetChanHorzBlu"])->Fill(ch->GetAmpltd());
00127       break;
00128    }
00129 
00130    UShort_t tstep = 0;
00131 
00132    if (gMeasInfo->fRunId == 5) {
00133       tstep = ch->GetDelimiterId();
00134       //NDcounts[(int)(st/12)][event->bid][TgtIndex[delim]]++;
00135    } else if (gMeasInfo->fRunId >= 6) {
00136       UInt_t ttime = ch->GetRevolutionId()/RHIC_REVOLUTION_FREQ;
00137 
00138       if (ttime < MAXDELIM) {
00139          tstep = TgtIndex[ttime];
00140          //++cntr.good[TgtIndex[ttime]];
00141          //NDcounts[(int)(st/12)][event->bid][TgtIndex[ttime]]++;
00142       } else if (!gAsymAnaInfo->HasAlphaBit()) {
00143          Error("Fill", "Time constructed from revolution #%d exeeds MAXDELIM=%d defined\n" \
00144                "Perhaps calibration data? Try running with --calib option", ttime, MAXDELIM);
00145       }
00146 
00147    } else {
00148       Warning("Fill", "Target tstep size is not defined for Run %d", gMeasInfo->fRunId);
00149    }
00150 
00151    ((TH1*) o["hTargetSteps"])->Fill(tstep);
00152 
00153 }

00155 
00159 void CnipolTargetHists::Fill(Int_t n, Double_t* hData)
00160 {
00161    ((TH1*) o["hTargetHorzLinear"])->SetBins(n, 0, n);
00162    ((TH1*) o["hTargetHorzLinear"])->SetContent(hData);
00163 
00164    ((TH1*) o["hTargetHorzRotary"])->SetBins(n, 0, n);
00165    ((TH1*) o["hTargetHorzRotary"])->SetContent(hData + (n+2) - 1);
00166 
00167    ((TH1*) o["hTargetVertLinear"])->SetBins(n, 0, n);
00168    ((TH1*) o["hTargetVertLinear"])->SetContent(hData + 2*(n+2) - 1);
00169 
00170    ((TH1*) o["hTargetVertRotary"])->SetBins(n, 0, n);
00171    ((TH1*) o["hTargetVertRotary"])->SetContent(hData + 3*(n+2) - 1);
00172 }

00176 void CnipolTargetHists::PostFill()
00177 {
00178    //char  htitle[100];
00179    float dx[MAXDELIM], y[MAXDELIM], dy[MAXDELIM];
00180    int   X_index = gMeasInfo->fRunId >= 6 ? nTgtIndex : gNDelimeters;
00181  
00182    float xmin, xmax;
00183    float margin = 0.02;
00184 
00185    //GetMinMax(nTgtIndex, tgt.X, margin, xmin, xmax);
00186    GetMinMax(X_index, tgt.X, margin, xmin, xmax);
00187 
00188    printf("xmin, xmax: %f, %f, %d, %d\n", xmin, xmax, X_index, gNDelimeters);
00189  
00190    // Make rate _vs deliminter plots
00191    for (int i=0; i<X_index; i++) {
00192 
00193      UInt_t count = ((TH1*) o["hTargetSteps"])->GetBinContent(i+1);
00194 
00195      dx[i] = 0;
00196      // y[i] = tgt.Interval[i] ? float(cntr.good[i]) / tgt.Interval[i] * MHz : 0 ;
00197      //dy[i] = tgt.Interval[i] ? float( sqrt( double(cntr.good[i]) ) ) / tgt.Interval[i] * MHz : 0;
00198 
00199       y[i] = tgt.Interval[i] ? float(count) / tgt.Interval[i] * MHz : 0 ;
00200      dy[i] = tgt.Interval[i] ? float(sqrt(count)) / tgt.Interval[i] * MHz : 0;
00201    }
00202  
00203    gAnaMeasResult->max_rate = GetMax(X_index, y);
00204 
00205    float ymin, ymax;
00206 
00207    GetMinMax(X_index, y, margin, ymin, ymax);
00208 
00209    //sprintf(htitle,"%.3f : Rate vs Taret Postion", gMeasInfo->RUNID);
00210  
00211    ((TH1*) o["rate_vs_delim"])->SetBins(100, xmin, xmax, 100, ymin, ymax);
00212  
00213    //TGraphErrors *rate_delim = new TGraphErrors(nTgtIndex, tgt.X, y, dx, dy);
00214    TGraphErrors *rate_delim = new TGraphErrors(X_index, tgt.X, y, dx, dy);
00215 
00216    rate_delim->SetMarkerStyle(20);
00217    rate_delim->SetMarkerColor(kBlue);
00218    ((TH1*) o["rate_vs_delim"])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(rate_delim, "P");
00219    //delete rate_delim;
00220  
00221    // Target Position vs Time
00222    //sprintf(htitle,"%.3f : Taret Postion vs. Time", gMeasInfo->RUNID);
00223  
00224    //TH2F *tgtx_vs_time = new TH2F("tgtx_vs_time", htitle, 10, xmin, xmax, 10, 0.5, gMeasInfo->fRunTime*1.2);
00225 
00226    ((TH1*) o["tgtx_vs_time"])->SetBins(10, xmin, xmax, 10, 0.5, gMeasInfo->fRunTime*1.2);
00227  
00228    //delete gAsymRoot.fHists->d["run"]->d["Run"]->o["tgtx_vs_time"];
00229    //gAsymRoot.fHists->d["run"]->d["Run"]->o["tgtx_vs_time"] = tgtx_vs_time;
00230  
00231    //TGraph *tgtx_time = new TGraph(nTgtIndex, tgt.X, tgt.Time);
00232    TGraph *tgtx_time = new TGraph(X_index, tgt.X, tgt.Time);
00233    tgtx_time->SetMarkerStyle(20);
00234    tgtx_time->SetMarkerColor(kBlue);
00235    ((TH1*) o["tgtx_vs_time"])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(tgtx_time, "P");
00236    //delete tgtx_time;
00237 }
